mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET pw = MD5(#{pw}), nick = #{nick}, birth_date = #{birth_date}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detail_address} WHERE user_code = #{user_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( user_code, img_url, id, pw, nick, address, detail_address, number, birth_date, email, created_date ) values ( #{user_code}, #{img_url}, #{id}, MD5(#{pw}), #{nick}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{number}, #{birth_date}, #{email}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = MD5(#{pw})
